paragraph: “When the Eternal first gave Love        A myriad hearts sprang into life;        Ears filled with music, eyes with light;        Pealed forth with hearts with love all rife:        All glory to the God of Love!”
question: What is the central theme of the poem based on the given excerpt?
answer: The central theme of the poem, based on the given excerpt, is the transformative and life-affirming power of Love. The poem suggests that Love brings vitality and beauty to the world, enhancing all aspects of existence.
